meanings.definition: A three-dimensional shape resembling a flattened sphere.
meanings.sent1: The artist sculpted small ellipsoids out of clay.
meanings.sent2: The planets in our solar system are not perfect spheres but rather ellipsoids.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy chased after the bouncing ellipsoids in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like shimmering ellipsoids in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The scientist used colorful ellipsoids to explain the concept to the students.

meanings.definition: A geometric figure defined by a set of points in space equidistant from two fixed points.
meanings.sent1: The radar detected the ellipsoids on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The satellite orbits the Earth in an elliptical path, forming ellipsoids.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map led them to a hidden cave filled with glowing ellipsoids.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like bouncing ellipsoids.
meanings.sent5: The architect used ellipsoids to design the futuristic building.
